articles.content:

articles.title: Donald Trump has a point about diversity, equity and inclusion
articles.description: The old biases the women’s movement railed against so persuasively have been replaced by new biases, almost as unfair and opaque as those of the ancien régime.

articles.title: White House offers incentives to federal employees to resign, warns of downsizing
articles.description: Trump administration proposes ‘deferred resignation program’ which would allow federal employees to remain on the payroll through Sept. 30 but not have to work
articles.content:

articles.author: Yahoo Finance
articles.title: Trump's spending freeze circus won't affect your health coverage or student loans
articles.description: After ordering federal agencies to freeze vast swaths of government spending, the White House partially walked back its move. By evening, a federal judge had blocked the funding halt.
articles.content:
It was a profoundly confusing Tuesday in Washington.
